text: Christopher Andrew Koster (born August 31, 1964) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 41st Attorney General of Missouri from 2009 to 2017. In 2016, Koster was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Missouri and lost to Republican nominee Eric Greitens in the general election. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Missouri attorneys general Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Lawyers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Koster
